Defined class ModelSelector with attribute(s) and method(s). Selecting data model type for generating process.

class gen_data_model.pro.model_selector.ModelSelector[source]

Bases: object

Defined class ModelSelector with attribute(s) and method(s). Selecting data model type for generating process. It defines:

attributes
GEN_VERBOSE - console text indicator for process-phase.
methods
choose_model - selecting type of model for generation.
format_name - formatting name for file module.
__str__ - dunder method for ModelSelector.
GEN_VERBOSE = 'GEN_DATA_MODEL::PRO::MODEL_SELECTOR'
classmethod choose_model(data_model_types, verbose=False)[source]

Choose type of data model.

Parameters

  • data_model_types (<dict>) – data model types.

  • verbose (<bool>) – enable/disable verbose option.

Returns

type of data model (1, 2, 3, …).

Return type

<int>

Exceptions

ATSTypeError | ATSBadCallError

classmethod format_name(model_name)[source]

Format file name (Format: model_<name>.py).

Parameters

model_name (<str>) – postfix name for data model file.

Returns

file name with extension (lower case).

Return type

<str>
